name: Activating Neurons (GKohlrausch)
description:
You will be a neuron and your mission is to make the brain healthy. Eliminate all bad thoughts, collect symbols that represent emotions, intelligence and knowledge and collect foods that are healthy for your brain and activate neurons.

Keyboard

To move: Left - left arrow Right - right arrow 

Jump: Up Arrow or press A 

Shoot: press X 

Activate Neurons: press B 

Access portals: press B 

Pause: press P 

View mission: press space
